episodes.synopsis: When the U.S. Army takes over a solar physicist's research, the military's attempt to turn it into a weapon results in a massive plasma cloud.
episodes.title: Night 1

episodes.synopsis: The military and the Defense Secretary believe the danger is over, but soon Michael's prediction is confirmed: The planet is likely to be torn apart.
episodes.title: Night 2

video.title: CAT. 8
video.synopsis: When a government experiment goes awry and sends a massive fireball hurtling toward Earth, it's up to a renegade scientist to save the planet.
